thread.section_title: MobileRecharge.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MobileRecharge.com | mobilerecharge.com
thread.title: Marcos Soto

author: Marcos Soto
title: Marcos Soto
text: I have lost a couple of recharges and it was because let's say I was in USA and charged my phone in Cuba. I was expecting the charge when I got to Cuba and didn't get it. The same happened when in Peru and recharged my Chilean phone. Otherwise, if I am in the country and recharged it, it works beautifully! But now I want to recharge my phone in Ecuador and I am afraid to do it.
